channel.title: Making a item stackable
channel.description:
Hello guys, while i was looking through the coding on my server i noticed how to make items stackable and i did not know how to do this before so just sharing it with you guys! 1) Go to [b]Item.Java[/b] in your [b]Source.[/b] 2) Search for [i][b]itemStackable[/b][/i] and you will see some code similar to [i][b]itemStackable[#####] = true;.[/b][/i] 3) Under one of the [i][b]itemStackable[#####] = true;, [/b] [/i] type the same thing, but change itemStackable[[i][b]#####[/b][/i]] to your item id. ([i][b]####[/b][/i] = numbers ;)) 4) [b]Complie[/b] and you should be [u][b]finished[/b][/u]!
Good luck with your servers, hoped this helpped some of the nooby coders out there:). ~[b]Nick[/b]

item.title: Making a item stackable
item.dc:creator: @nickog15 nickog15
item.description:
@nickog15 wrote:

Hello guys, while i was looking through the coding on my server i noticed how to make items stackable and i did not know how to do this before so just sharing it with you guys!

  1. Go to Item.Java in your Source.
  2. Search for itemStackable and you will see some code similar to itemStackable[#####] = true;.
  3. Under one of the itemStackable[#####] = true;, type the same thing, but change itemStackable[#####] to your item id.
    (#### = numbers ;))
  4. Complie and you should be finished!

Good luck with your servers, hoped this helpped some of the nooby coders out there:).
~Nick

Read full topic
